text_title: Kredi ve  Debit kart (Processed securely by PayPal)
error_required: Uyarı: All payment information fields are required.
error_general: Uyarı: A general problem has occurred with the transaction. Please try again.
error_config: Uyarı: Payment module configuration error. Please verify the login credentials.
error_address: Uyarı: A match of the Payment Address City, State, and Postal Code failed. Please try again.
error_declined: Uyarı: This transaction has been declined. Please try again.
error_invalid: Uyarı: The provided credit card information is invalid. Please try again.
